source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

sockets.display_string: Grants the user invisibility for 14-18 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Safety fuses built into this device reduce the chance of its slotted tinker malfunctioning by up to 15%. Does not stack with similar specialization bonuses.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 454,643 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 214,318.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.
Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 454,643 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 214,318.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 454,643 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 214,318.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

spells.description:
Equip: Healing an ally has a chance to grant you both a Unifying Ember. When two Unifying Embers contact each other, they erupt into Unifying Flames.

Unifying Flames grants the wearer 1,175 of their highest secondary stat, and others 235 of a random secondary stat.

Use: Inject a medicinal frostfire formula into your veins, instantly healing you for up to 5.4 million from a jolt of frost. To prevent sudden hypothermia, you will then burn for 30% of the amount healed.

Shares a cooldown with healing potions. (5 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Safety fuses built into this device reduce the chance of its slotted tinker malfunctioning by up to 15%. Does not stack with similar specialization bonuses.

item.name: Eternal Bindings of the August Acolyte

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Eternal Bindings of the August Acolyte

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 454,643 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 214,318.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

spells.description: Use: Sever your bond at the cost of 1 Blasphemite. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants 391 to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.
Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 927,918 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.
